sourcesContent:
const resumeTemplate = {
  summary: `
\\begin{rSection}{Summary}
\\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=*]
    \\item Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience in building scalable full-stack applications across BFSI, HealthCare, and eCommerce sectors.
    \\item Proficient in Java Full Stack Development (Spring Boot, React/Angular) with hands-on cloud (AWS) and DevOps experience.
    % JD_BASED_SUMMARY_POINT_1
    % JD_BASED_SUMMARY_POINT_2
\\end{itemize}
\\end{rSection}
`,

  metlife: `
\\textbf{Software Engineer} \\textbar  {MetLife} \\textbar {Missouri, USA} \\hfill  \\textbf{Aug 2024 - Present}
\\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=*]
    \\item Implemented \\textbf{Agile/Scrum methodologies} to boost productivity and streamline delivery cycles, improving release timelines by % JD_METLIFE_BULLET_1.
    \\item Developed \\textbf{[type of applications]} using \\textbf{Java, Spring Boot, Microservices}, enhancing % JD_METLIFE_BULLET_2.
    \\item Built responsive UIs using \\textbf{React/Angular}, achieving % JD_METLIFE_BULLET_3.
    \\item Deployed AWS apps with \\textbf{EC2, S3, VPC, ELB}, reducing costs by % JD_METLIFE_BULLET_4.
\\end{itemize}
`,

  adons: `
\\textbf{Software Engineer} \\textbar  {Adons Soft Tech} \\textbar {India} \\hfill  \\textbf{Jan 2020 - Aug 2021}
\\begin{itemize}[leftmargin=*]
    \\item Delivered projects using \\textbf{Waterfall/Agile}, ensuring on-time delivery with % JD_ADONS_BULLET_1.
    \\item Built backend solutions in \\textbf{Java, JSP, JDBC}, improving % JD_ADONS_BULLET_2.
    \\item Designed UIs with \\textbf{HTML, CSS, JavaScript}, improving UX by % JD_ADONS_BULLET_3.
\\end{itemize}
`,

  skills: `
\\begin{rSection}{Technical Skills}
% JD_SKILLS_SECTION
\\end{rSection}
`,
};

const coverLetterTemplate = `
Dear [Hiring Manager / Recruiter],

I am writing to express my strong interest in the [JOB_TITLE] role at [COMPANY_NAME]. With a background in full-stack development and recent experience at MetLife and Adons Soft Tech, I have successfully led projects using Java, Spring Boot, React, and AWS.

% JD_BASED_COVER_PARAGRAPH

I would welcome the opportunity to bring my skills to your team. Thank you for considering my application.

Best regards,  
Mahaboob Pasha
`;

const coldEmailTemplate = `
Subject: Application for [JOB_TITLE] – [Your Name]

Hi [Recruiter's Name],

I hope you're doing well. I recently came across the [JOB_TITLE] position at [COMPANY_NAME] and was immediately drawn to it based on my background in full-stack engineering, particularly in Java, React, and AWS.

% JD_BASED_EMAIL_LINE

Would love to connect or explore ways I might contribute to your team. Please find my resume attached.

Best,  
Mahaboob Pasha Mohammad
LinkdeIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/mohammad-mahaboob-pasha-19ba58183/
Portfolio: https://miabu-pashh.github.io/Portfolio-maibu/
GitHub: https://github.com/miabu-pashh
Phone: +1-314-305-6056
`;

export { resumeTemplate, coverLetterTemplate, coldEmailTemplate };
